Description: Engineered a Dynamic RAG Pipeline using LangChain and LangGraph creating an agentic workflow that autonomously falls back to web search tools. Developed a Reactive Agent for the existing application using HITL mechanisms. Optimized agent performance using LangSmith Studio and RAGAS scoring. Built interactive chatbots using Streamlit and LCEL.

Engineered a sensitive data classification ML model achieving a 25% increase in accuracy. Architected a high-performance OCR model pipeline attaining 95% accuracy and reducing runtime by 30%. Streamlined team workflows by integrating Agile methodologies (Sprint Planning Retrospectives) resulting in a 20% improvement in delivery efficiency.
